attributes.action: Increase NHS spending by removing the charity tax status of unaccountable private health care groups
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nuffield Hospitals, BUPA and other private health providers appear among Britains most profitable businesses. Yet they have charitable tax and rates status due to historic anomalies. They are unaccountable and pay very high fees and salaries to unelected Directors and senior staff. They are aggressively driven by profit not charitable service. 

The substantial tax revenue they avoid should be used for the general good, not for the benefit of their Directors and senior management.
